claims.claim: DB Lumina was adopted by hundreds of research analysts after 12 months of development
claims.quote: The adoption of the DB Lumina digital assistant by hundreds of research analysts is the culmination of more than 12 months of intense collaboration between dbResearch, our internal development team, and many others.

claims.claim: DB Lumina helps automate data analysis, streamline workflows, and deliver more accurate and timely insights
claims.quote: We created DB Lumina — an AI-powered research agent that helps automate data analysis, streamline workflows, and deliver more accurate and timely insights – all while maintaining the stringent data privacy requirements for the highly regulated financial sector.

claims.claim: DB Lumina can perform tasks like summarization, proofreading, translation, and content drafting with precision and speed
claims.quote: DB Lumina can help with tasks like summarization, proofreading, translation, and content drafting with precision and speed.

claims.claim: The goal was to enhance the research analyst experience and reduce the reliance on manual processes and outsourcing
claims.quote: Our goal was to enhance the research analyst experience and reduce the reliance on manual processes and outsourcing.

claims.claim: Banks are reducing repetitive tasks by 40 to 60% using AI tools
claims.quote: From JPMorgan's AI pitchbook tools to Deutsche Bank's internal copilots, banks are reducing repetitive tasks by 40 to 60%.

claims.claim: AI enables tasks that take 10 hours to be completed in 10 seconds
claims.quote: AI will enable us to do tasks that take 10 hours in 10 seconds – Jay Horine, Co-Head of Investment Banking at JPMorgan

claims.claim: One AI-empowered analyst can do the work of five analysts
claims.quote: One AI-empowered analyst can do the work of five.

claims.claim: A 15-person firm with AI tools can outperform a 50-person team
claims.quote: With the right AI tools, a 15-person firm can outperform a 50-person team. – Artis M&A founder

claims.claim: Smaller hedge funds are seeing 40%+ efficiency gains from AI
claims.quote: Even smaller hedge funds are seeing 40%+ efficiency gains, according to Hedgeweek.
